trans-unit.source: Appears as the root of the visual subtree generated for a group.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示為群組所產生之視覺化樹狀子目錄的根目錄。

trans-unit.source: A GroupItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: GroupItem 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，這表示它可以包含單一物件的任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 排列內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref> should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 父系內的最終區域， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"> </xref>應該用來排列本身和其子系。

trans-unit.source: The actual sized used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 實際大小所使用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>套用新的範本時。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the OnApplyTemplate method.
trans-unit.target: 每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞，呼叫 OnApplyTemplate 方法時，會叫用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>這個物件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears all property associations.
trans-unit.target: 清除所有屬性關聯性。

trans-unit.source: Removes the association between the specified item and property.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的項目和屬性之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: The associated item.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: The associated property.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified property from all property lists.
trans-unit.target: 所有的屬性清單中移除指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified property that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定的項目相關聯的指定屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The item that has the specified property associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的屬性相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: The property whose value to return.
trans-unit.target: 屬性傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified property that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目相關聯的指定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Stores the specified property and value and associates them with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 儲存指定的屬性和值，並將其與指定的項目相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The item to associate the value and property with.
trans-unit.target: 要產生關聯的值和屬性與項目。

trans-unit.source: The property that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the associated property.
trans-unit.target: 相關內容的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the sizes of the control's viewport and cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，表示控制項的檢視區和快取的大小。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the sizes of the control's viewport and cache.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示控制項的檢視區和快取的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the desired size of the control's header.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，表示控制項的標頭的所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the desired size of the control's header.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示控制項的標頭的所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control's layout pass occurs at a lower priority.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項的配置傳遞就會發生在較低的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control's layout pass occurs at a lower priority; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項的版面配置傳遞，就會發生在較低的優先順序;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the desired size of the control's items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示控制項的項目所需的大小的物件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the desired size of the control's items.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示控制項的項目所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> that displays the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref>顯示控制項的項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> that displays the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref>顯示控制項的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owning <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> should virtualize its items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否擁有<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>應虛擬化其項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the owning <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> should virtualize its items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果擁有<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>應虛擬化其項目，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
